title: Nonconcentration of eigenfunctions for partially rectangular billiards

title_detail.value: Nonconcentration of eigenfunctions for partially rectangular billiards

summary:
In this paper, the results of Burq and Zworski are further developed to study
nonconcentration of eigenfunctions for billiards which have rectangular
components: these include the Buminovich billiard, the Sinai billiard, and
certain pseudointegrable billiards. The results presented are an application of
using a "black box" point of view as presented by the same authors.
